delete.description: User must have the DOMAIN_SCOPE[DELETE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_SCOPE[DELETE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_SCOPE[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

patch.description: User must have the DOMAIN_SCOPE[UPDATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_SCOPE[UPDATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_SCOPE[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

get.summary: List scopes for a security domain
get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_SCOPE[LIST] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_SCOPE[LIST] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_SCOPE[LIST] permission on the specified organization Each returned scope is filtered and contains only basic information such as id, key, name, description, isSystem and isDiscovery.

200.description: List scopes for a security domain

post.description: User must have the DOMAIN_SCOPE[CREATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_SCOPE[CREATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_SCOPE[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the DOMAIN_FORM[UPDATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_FORM[UPDATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_FORM[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

delete.description: User must have the DOMAIN_FORM[DELETE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_FORM[DELETE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_FORM[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_FORM[READ] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_FORM[READ] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_FORM[READ] permission on the specified organization

post.description: User must have the DOMAIN_FORM[CREATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_FORM[CREATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_FORM[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_AUDIT[READ] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_AUDIT[READ] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_AUDIT[READ] permission on the specified organization

get.summary: List audit logs for a security domain
get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_AUDIT[LIST] permission on the specified domain, environment or organization. Except if user has ORGANIZATION_AUDIT[READ] permission on the domain, environment or organization, each returned audit is filtered and contains only basic information such as id, date, event, actor, target and status.

200.description: List audit logs for a security domain

get.summary: List members for a security domain
get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_MEMBER[LIST] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_MEMBER[LIST] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_MEMBER[LIST] permission on the specified organization

200.description: List members for a security domain

post.summary: Add or update an security domain member
post.description: User must have the DOMAIN_MEMBER[CREATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_MEMBER[CREATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_MEMBER[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

201.description: Member has been added or updated successfully

delete.description: User must have the DOMAIN_MEMBER[DELETE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_MEMBER[DELETE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_MEMBER[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have DOMAIN[READ] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN[READ] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN[READ] permission on the specified organization
User must have the DOMAIN_ROLE[READ] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_ROLE[READ] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_ROLE[READ] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the DOMAIN_ROLE[UPDATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_ROLE[UPDATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_ROLE[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

delete.description: User must have the DOMAIN_ROLE[DELETE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_ROLE[DELETE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_ROLE[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

400.description: Role is bind to existing users

get.summary: List registered roles for a security domain
get.description: User must have the DOMAIN_ROLE[LIST] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_ROLE[LIST] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_ROLE[LIST] permission on the specified organization. Each returned role is filtered and contains only basic information such as id and name.

200.description: List registered roles for a security domain

post.description: User must have the DOMAIN_ROLE[CREATE] permission on the specified domain or DOMAIN_ROLE[CREATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN_ROLE[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: List all the security domains accessible to the current user. User must have DOMAIN[LIST] permission on the specified environment or organization AND either DOMAIN[READ] permission on each security domain or DOMAIN[READ] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN[READ] permission on the specified organization.Each returned domain is filtered and contains only basic information such as id, name and description and isEnabled.

200.description: List accessible security domains for current user

post.description: Create a security domain. User must have DOMAIN[CREATE] permission on the specified environment or DOMAIN[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_AUDIT[READ] permission on the specified organization

get.summary: List audit logs for the organization
get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_AUDIT[LIST] permission on the specified organization. Except if user has ORGANIZATION_AUDIT[READ] permission on the organization, each returned audit is filtered and contains only basic information such as id, date, event, actor, target and status.

200.description: List audit logs for the platform

get.description: User must have ORGANIZATION_MEMBER[LIST] permission on the specified organization

post.summary: Add or update an organization member
post.description: User must have ORGANIZATION_MEMBER[READ] permission on the specified organization

201.description: Member has been added or updated successfully

delete.summary: Remove a membership of the organization
delete.description: User must have ORGANIZATION_MEMBER[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_TAG[READ] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_TAG[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

delete.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_TAG[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION[LIST] permission on the specified organization. Each returned tag is filtered and contains only basic information such as id and name.

post.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_TAG[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ENTRYPOINT[READ] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ENTRYPOINT[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

delete.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ENTRYPOINT[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION[LIST] permission on the specified organization. Each returned entrypoint is filtered and contains only basic information such as id and name.

post.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ENTRYPOINT[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ROLE[READ] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ROLE[UPDATE] permission on the specified organization

delete.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ROLE[DELETE] permission on the specified organization

400.description: Role is bind to existing users

get.summary: List registered roles of the organization
get.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ROLE[LIST] permission on the specified organization. Each returned role is filtered and contains only basic information such as id, name, isSystem and assignableType.

200.description: List registered roles of the organization

post.summary: Create a role for the organization
post.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION_ROLE[CREATE] permission on the specified organization

put.description: User must have the ORGANIZATION[CREATE] permission on the platform
